attributes.action: Introduce a Death sentence for convicted child sex offenders, or a referendum
attributes.additional_details: We live in a democracy, in a democratic society the authorities should advocate the justice that the vast majority of the public want. The vast majority of the British public would advocate this law, if parliament can't make this decision then allow the people to do so via a referendum.
attributes.background: Bring about laws that will allow termination of convicted child sex offenders. If not, have a referendum and ask the people what they want

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a referendum to reinstate capital punishment for child murder: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602657

Bring back death penalty for child killers and mass murderers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602898
